summary: Six troubled high schoolers and their leader become lost after their bus crashes during a raging storm. They seeks refuge for the night in an abandoned trailer park, managed by a sexy woman, Norma.
cast: Nichole Hiltz|Lew Temple|Jeanette Brox|Myk Watford|Michelle Lee|Ed Corbin|Ricky Mabe|Cody McMains|Hayley Marie Norman|Ryan Carnes|Stefanie Black|Matthew Del Negro|Trisha Rae Stahl|Brock Cuchna|Priscilla Barnes|Duane Whitaker|Tracey Walter|Dale Dickey|Brandon Ellison|J.P. Manoux|Tom Lenk|Trace Adkins|J. Brian Miles|Gabriel Bogner|Alexandra Goldmann|Arielle Hakian|Chris Symonds|Michael Symonds|Madonna Cacciatore|Corryn Cummins|Lindsay Johnston|Barry Ratcliffe|Corby Sullivan
title: Trailer Park of Terror
